text: "A Hard Rain's a-Gonna Fall" is a 1963 song by Bob Dylan. It was taken from his second studio album The Freewheelin' Bob Dylan. It went to be covered by Joan Baez, Pete Seeger, Leon Russell and Bryan Ferry for his debut studio album These Foolish Things. It went to number 10 in the United Kingdom. title: A Hard Rain's a-Gonna Fall
